tool_description:
An alphametic is puzzle where a sum is represented with words such that each letter represents a single digit throughout the puzzle - and must have only one solution.  While many variations exist my database is (currently) base 10 sums only.  
ex: LETS+SEE+A=TOTAL :: 9615+566+8=10189
name: Cryptarithm
title: Cryptarithm

api_list.name: Alphametics shorter than
api_list.description: Returns a JSON set of alphametics where the puzzle length is shorter than the specified size.

optional_parameters.name: number_of_results
optional_parameters.description: Up to your monthly limit (default is 1)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?smaller=25&desc=1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?smaller={size}&desc={number_of_results}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Alphametics longer than
api_list.description: Returns a JSON set of alphametics where the puzzle length is longer than the specified size.

optional_parameters.name: number_of_results
optional_parameters.description: Up to your monthly limit (default is 1)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?bigger=5&asc=1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?bigger={size}&asc={number_of_results}"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Alphametics by letters
api_list.description: Returns a JSON set of alphametics which use only the given letters

required_parameters.name: letters
required_parameters.description: (Up to 10, all together) the letters the alphametic is created with

optional_parameters.name: number_of_results
optional_parameters.description: Up to your monthly limit (default is 1)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?letters=TESLA&random=5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?letters={letters}&random={number_of_results}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Alphametics by unique ID
api_list.description: Returns a JSON set of alphametics before the supplied ID

required_parameters.name: number_of_results
required_parameters.description: Up to your monthly limit (default is 1)

api_list.name: Random alphametics
api_list.description: Return a JSON set of random alphametics

optional_parameters.name: number_of_results
optional_parameters.description: Up to your monthly limit (default is 1)

api_list.code:

headers = {

api_list.name: Alphametics by complexity
api_list.description: Returns a JSON set of alphametics that use only {int:complexity} letters

required_parameters.name: complexity
required_parameters.description: The number of letters in the desired alphametic

optional_parameters.name: number_of_results
optional_parameters.description: Up to your monthly limit (default is 1)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?complexity=5&random=1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ceneezer-cryptarithm-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
